title: Rep. Gowdy urges to look more at FL shooter than the "instrumentality"
text:
Rep. Gowdy urges to look more at FL shooter than the "instrumentality" Sunday, February 18, 2018 - 01:30 
Rep. Trey Gowdy said on CBS' ''Face the Nation'' that he ''applauded'' the Florida students that were pushing for stricter gun laws, but said it would be a ''disservice'' if they only looked at the ''instrumentality'' and not the shooter. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
